internal.content:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage'; export default HomepageTemplate; ## What to expect ![Grid Example](guides/images/cloud.svg)

An introduction to the basic concepts related to cloud use cases.

 ![Grid Example](guides/images/idea.svg)

Information about how certain clouds take advantage of open source solutions.

 ![Grid Example](guides/images/teacher.svg)

Additional learning resources so you can further your understanding.
